channel.title: Pearls of Torah
channel.itunes:author: TODO
channel.description: Welcome to the “Pearls of Torah" podcast, where we dive deep into the timeless wisdom of the Torah. I'm your host, Lizette, a messianic artist and a firm believer in the whole Bible. We'll be reading from “Bible Commentary Based on Jewish Sources and thought" by Dr. Richard A Elofer, uncovering the profound truths within its pages. Join me on this enlightening journey as we explore the Torah from a Messianic perspective. Read along with us at home, church or anywhere. Find the Author's books on Amazon. Connect with us at sweetjulian.co where I you can find: original messianic artwork children's books torah homeschool printables
